description:
Darius is one of the human-chimeras protecting http://anidb.net/ch14594 [Solf J. Kimblee]. Later he joined Elrics with his partner http://anidb.net/ch16466 [Heinkel].
Darius is tall, well built muscular man with dark hair and sideburns. In his chimera form he has appearance of gorilla, albeit much more humanoid and bipedal.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Darius
